FRAC-02.title: Benchmarks & Comparison
FRAC-02.objective: Compare fractions to 1/2 and to each other using number line reasoning.

facts.prompt: Which is larger: 2/10 or 1/2? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/10 < 1/2)
Which is larger: 2/12 or 3/7? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/12 < 3/7)
Which is larger: 4/8 or 1/4? (answer with <, >, or = where 4/8 > 1/4)
Which is larger: 2/6 or 9/10? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/6 < 9/10)
Which is larger: 2/3 or 11/12? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/3 < 11/12)
Which is larger: 4/10 or 3/11? (answer with <, >, or = where 4/10 > 3/11)
Which is larger: 5/7 or 3/4? (answer with <, >, or = where 5/7 < 3/4)
Which is larger: 1/2 or 8/11? (answer with <, >, or = where 1/2 < 8/11)
Which is larger: 1/2 or 2/3? (answer with <, >, or = where 1/2 < 2/3)
Which is larger: 2/5 or 1/2? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/5 < 1/2)
Which is larger: 1/3 or 3/9? (answer with <, >, or = where 1/3 = 3/9)
Which is larger: 2/4 or 9/12? (answer with <, >, or = where 2/4 < 9/12)

FRAC-03.title: Equivalent Fractions
FRAC-03.objective: Generate and recognize equivalent fractions; fill in missing terms.

FRAC-05.title: Multiples & LCM
FRAC-05.objective: List multiples and find least common multiples to prepare for addition/subtraction.

FRAC-06.title: Improper ↔ Mixed
FRAC-06.objective: Convert between improper fractions and mixed numbers.

FRAC-07.title: Add Like Denominators
FRAC-07.objective: Add fractions with like denominators; simplify.

FRAC-08.title: Subtract Like Denominators
FRAC-08.objective: Subtract fractions with like denominators; simplify.

FRAC-09.title: Add Unlike (Multiple Case)
FRAC-09.objective: Add fractions where one denominator is a multiple of the other.

FRAC-10.title: Add Unlike (General LCM)
FRAC-10.objective: Add fractions using the LCM method; show steps.

FRAC-12.title: Subtract Unlike (General LCM)
FRAC-12.objective: Subtract fractions using the LCM method; show steps.

FRAC-13.title: Fraction × Whole Number
FRAC-13.objective: Multiply a fraction by a whole number; model scaling.

FRAC-14.title: Fraction × Fraction
FRAC-14.objective: Multiply two fractions; simplify using cross-cancellation.

FRAC-16.title: Fraction ÷ Fraction (Reciprocal)
FRAC-16.objective: Divide fractions by fractions using reciprocals; simplify.
